name: Sammy Virji
description: '''Samuel Bashir Virji''' (born 30 September 1996) is an English DJ and record producer. Born in [[London]], he grew up in [[Witney]], and attended [[Newcastle University]] before dropping out to pursue his music career. His 2020 album, ''Spice Up My Life'', charted at No. 7 on the [[UK Dance Albums Chart]]. After releasing a remix of [[Piri & Tommy]]'s "[[On & On (Piri & Tommy song)|On & On]]", he released "If U Need It", which charted at No. 85 on the [[UK singles chart]]. His earlier works belonged to the [[Bassline (music genre)|bassline]] genre, while his later works were [[UK garage]].
